page.title: 12PLACES TO STAY IN CONNEL
page.content: {Loch Nell Arms Hotel,North Connel_} Motto_'Come and be spoilt' This hotel which is about 300years old is open all the year round. {Ossian's Hotel,North Connel_ } This modern building,15 years old,is not open in winter. {Falls of Lora Hotel,Connel_ } It was built in 1886 but has modern wing with radio/intercom system.Luxury rooms have either 4 Poster bed and king size round bath or 7"round bed and Jacuzzi bathroom. {Dunstaffnage Arms Hotel,Connel_ } A reasonably priced family hotel(Bed and Breakfast from Â£9).The building is about 150 years old but an inn has been there for over 600 years. {Local guest houses}include_Ards Guest} House,Lusragan Lodge and Mactalla.
